meanings.definition: A person who is not a member of a particular group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The club meeting was only for members, so the nonmember had to wait outside.
meanings.sent2: The nonmember decided to join the gym after seeing how much fun the members were having.
meanings.sent3: The nonmember tried to sneak into the exclusive party, but was caught at the door.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of red shirts, the nonmember stood out like a sore thumb.
meanings.sent5: Being a nonmember of the team, he felt left out during the celebrations.
